doc:
Mary Hay (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Hay_(actress) 0 Mary Hay (August 22, 1901 – June 4, 1957) was an American dancer, musical comedy and silent screen actress, playwright and former Ziegfeld girl, active over the decade popularly known as the Roaring Twenties. Mary_Hay ( August_22_,_1901 – June_4_,_1957 ) was an_American_dancer , musical_comedy and silent_screen_actress , playwright and former_Ziegfeld_girl , active over the_decade popularly_known as the_Roaring_Twenties .
